maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Move away human, great eldest has forbidden entry to old home because of \c[3]black monsters\c[0].
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Aller ailleurs, humain. Grande altesse a interdit entrée dans ancienne maison à cause de \c[3]monstres noirs\c[0].

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Look up to see what you humans did.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Regardez là-haut pour voir ce que vous humains avoir fait.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You brought \c[3]black monsters\c[0] into our land.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Vous avoir apporté \c[3]monstre noir\c[0] sur nos terres.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: We had to give up great eldest house to keep fiends here.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Nous avoir dû abandonner maison de grande altesse pour contenir monstres.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: This path, leads to great eldress house.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Ce chemin mener à la maison de grande altesse.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You may pass, since you helped.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Vous pouvoir passer, vu que vous avoir aidé.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: We're finally here.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: On y est.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Let's act quickly. If I remember correctly, the spot was somewhere around here.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Dépêchons-nous. Si je me souviens bien, l'endroit était quelque part par là...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Eeek! I forgot how suddenly it comes up...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Wouah ! J'ai oublié à quelle vitesse ça surgissait...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Back when I was young, me and the other younglings played here and found this.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Quand j'étais jeune, moi et mes amis avions joués ici et découvert ça.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I believe it was an old escape route built by the founders of our village.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Je crois que c'était autrefois une sortie de secours construite par les fondateurs de notre village.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: The important part: We can now get to the Chief's Den.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: En tout cas, maintenant on peut aller dans la Hutte du Chef.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Up ahead are a lot of Wiccats. And also something which I believe must be their source.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Plus loin il y a plein de \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s. Et aussi quelque chose qui doit être leur source.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I don't know exactly where the source is, but my bet is in one of the houses.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Je ne sais pas exactement où est la source, mais je parie qu'elle est dans une des maisons.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: The others told me it should not be very hard to miss as it looks pretty out of place.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Les autres m'ont dit qu'elle était difficile à rater, car elle ne semble pas venir d'ici.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Some kind of \c[3]glowing pole\c[0]... They believe it's an extension from that cursed powerplant.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: C'est une sorte de \c[3]pôle brillant\c[0]... Ils pensent que c'est une extension de cette satanée centrale.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: My hope is that by getting rid of the source, we can put an end to this infestation.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: J'espère qu'en se débarrassant de la source, on pourra mettre fin à l'infestation.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Seeker, you must go in and find this source.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], vous devez y aller et trouver cette source.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I'm sure that by doing so, we can calm the Shad and bring an end to the tension.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Je suis sûr qu'en faisant ça, on pourra calmer les Shads et mettre fin à cette tension.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I'll wait here. Come back to me once you're done.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Je vais attendre ici. Revenez me voir quand vous aurez fini.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Do we have to fight the kittens again...?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Est-ce qu'il faut encore combattre les chatons... ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: It should suffice to get rid of the \c[3]source\c[0]! But we may not be able to avoid fighting some of the Wiccats this time!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Détruire la \c[3]source\c[0] devrait suffire ! Mais on ne va peut-être pas pouvoir échapper à devoir combattre quelques \c[3]\v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s\c[0] cette fois !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: This game is cruel...!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Ce jeu est cruel... !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Seeker, you must go in and find this source.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], vous devez y aller et trouver cette source.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I'm sure that by doing so, we can calm the Shad and bring an end to the tension.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Je suis sûr qu'en faisant ça, on pourra calmer les Shads et mettre fin à cette tension.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I'll wait here. Come back to me once you're done.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Je vais attendre ici. Revenez me voir quand vous aurez fini.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You're back! Did you find the source of the infestation?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Vous êtes de retour ! Avez-vous trouvé la source de cette infestation ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You really did it?!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Vraiment ?!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Where did you find it? What was it?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Où l'avez-vous trouvé ? Qu'est-ce que c'était ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You see, it was below... \.\.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Vous savez, c'était en dessous du...\.\.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: It was below the Chief's house? And some strange poles that summoned the Wiccats?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: C'était en dessous de la Hutte du Chef ? Et c'était des poles étranges qui faisaient apparaitre les \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black] ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: That really doesn't sound like something humans could do.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Cela ne ressemble pas à ce que des humains peuvent faire.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: This is a sacred place to my people. We better not tell them that you've been there...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: C'est un endroit sacré pour notre peuple. Nous ferions mieux de ne pas dire que vous y avez été...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Well, all those Wiccats sure are gone suddenly...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Bon, les \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s ont en tout cas tous disparu...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: This is amazing. Let's quickly go to our Eldress and tell her the news!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: C'est fantastique. Allons vite voir l'Altesse et lui apporter la bonne nouvelle !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: If she sees the cats gone, I'm certain the Shad will calm down.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Si elle voit que les chats sont plus là, les Shads vont sûrement devenir plus tranquilles.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: She is resting in the western part of the village. There is a large tree in the middle of the lake.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Elle se repose dans la partie ouest du village. Il y a un grand arbre au milieu du lac.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Come find me there.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: On se revoit là-bas.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: It looks like my input wasn't needed.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: On dirait que ce que je voulais dire n'était pas nécessaire...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Lea's expression says it all.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: C'est que le regard de Lea dit tout.
